title: üö® Report n8n workflow errors directly to your email
author: Mutasem
readme:
## Use case

Error workflows are an important part of running workflows in production. Get alerts for errors directly in your inbox.

![Screenshot 20240301 at 16.35.27.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_03_01_at_16_35_27_7231334640.png)

## How to setup

  1. Add your Gmail creds
  2. Add your target email
  3. Add this error workflow to other workflows  
[docs here](https://docs.n8n.io/flow-logic/error-handling/#create-and-set-an-error-workflow)
